name: Club Penguin Demake Project
description:
W.I.P

Made by @CarlosA656.

Happy 15th birthday, Club Penguin. <3

This game is a recreation of our beloved Club Penguin island into the Game Boy console.
Have in mind this release is only a demonstration and not all rooms are available.
Also no music yet. :'(

If you enjoyed this, consider buying me a coffee: ko-fi.com/carlos656 (or if you prefer, Itch.io has a donation option). :D

Keyboard Controls:

Up - Up Arrow / W 
Down - Down Arrow / S 
Left - Left Arrow / A 
Right - Right Arrow / D 
A - Alt / Z / J 
B - Ctrl / K / X 
Start - Enter 
Select - Shift

Note: If you are playing this game on mobile, virtual controls will automatically appear.
